price: ߤߊߟߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߕߌߢߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߐ߲߫
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
